content: As an AI language model, I cannot predict the future plans of a company. However, it is worth noting that Universal Music Group's recent acquisitions and partnerships have helped the company to expand into new areas, such as animation, gaming, and digital marketing. It's possible that the company may continue to explore opportunities in these areas, or even look at other industries where it can leverage its expertise and resources. That being said, the music industry itself is a vast and constantly evolving landscape, so it's likely that Universal Music Group will focus heavily on expanding and refining its offerings within the music industry for the foreseeable future.
